CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Both copolymers possess good solubility , high thermal stability , broad absorption , and low bandgap and exhibit not only high field - effect mobilities but also high photovoltaic properties.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers |
| high thermal stability |
| broad absorption |
| low bandgap |
| high field - effect mobilities |
| high photovoltaic properties |

Note: I have included "high thermal stability," "broad absorption," and "high field - effect mobilities" as phrases since they were mentioned as properties of the copolymers, and the question asked for "Material Name" entities, which can be interpreted as any material or material-related concepts.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers |

After reviewing the paragraph again, I realized that there is only one clear material name mentioned, which is "copolymers." The other phrases mentioned are properties of the copolymers, not material names.

Paragraph: Both copolymers possess good solubility , high thermal stability , broad absorption , and low bandgap and exhibit not only high field - effect mobilities but also high photovoltaic properties.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| good solubility |
| high thermal stability |
| broad absorption |
| low bandgap |
| high field-effect mobilities |
| high photovoltaic properties |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| good solubility |
| high thermal stability |
| broad absorption |
| low bandgap |
| high field-effect mobilities |

Explanation:

* "High photovoltaic properties" is a property of a material, but it is not a material property in the same sense as the other properties listed. It is a property of a device made from the material. Therefore, it has been excluded from the final list.
